import React from 'react' import { Button } from 'antd' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import styles from './style.module.scss' import LoginForm from './LoginForm' class LoginAlpha extends React.Component { state = { fullScreen: false, backgroundNumber: 1, } setFullscreen = () => { const { fullScreen } = this.state this.setState({ fullScreen: !fullScreen, }) } changeBackground = () => { let { backgroundNumber } = this.state if (backgroundNumber === 5) { backgroundNumber = 1 } else { backgroundNumber += 1 } this.setState({ backgroundNumber, }) } render() { const { fullScreen, backgroundNumber } = this.state return (
